categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Ember" was the nickname of a human who served as a pilot in the First Order during the New Republic Era. As a member of the First Order Special Forces and the First Order starfighter corps, Ember piloted a TIE/ba Baron Space Superiority Interceptor, and at one point was accompanied by two TIE/sf space superiority fighters. Ember was equipped with a red fighter pilot uniform, had fair skin, and had brown hair.
